template.name: APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200
template.description:
## Overview
* LLD of Sensors (Currently Temperature and Humidity & Wireless Tempurature and Humidity) * Trigger Prototypes for recommended Humidity and Tempurature based on Netbotz configured thresholds * Graph Prototypes for Temperature and Humidity

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Long Term Decreasing Rate Time
{#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Long Term Decreasing Rate Value
{#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Long Term Increasing Rate Time
{#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Long Term Increasing Rate Value
{#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Short Term Decreasing Rate Time
{#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Short Term Decreasing Rate Value
{#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Short Term Increasing Rate Time
{#SNMPVALUE} Temperature: Threshold - Short Term Increasing Rate Value

trigger_prototype.expression: ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}<={APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.low.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()})
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>=({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.low.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}+{APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.hysteresis.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}))
trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} {ITEM.LASTVALUE} :: Humidity < Low Threshold

dependency.name: {#SNMPVALUE} {ITEM.LASTVALUE} :: Humidity < Min Threshold
dependency.expression: ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}<={APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.min.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()})
dependency.recovery_expression: ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>=({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.min.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}+{APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.hysteresis.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}))

trigger_prototype.expression: ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>={APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.high.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()})
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}<=({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.high.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}-{APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.hysteresis.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}))
trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} {ITEM.LASTVALUE} :: Humidity > High Threshold

dependency.name: {#SNMPVALUE} {ITEM.LASTVALUE} :: Humidity > Max Threshold
dependency.expression: ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>={APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 200:apc.enviro.sensor.module.humidity.threshold.max.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()})

* LLD of Sensors (Currently Temperature and Humidity & Wireless Tempurature and Humidity) * Trigger Prototypes for recommended Humidity and Tempurature based on Netbotz configured thresholds * Graph Prototypes for Temperature and Humidity

trigger_prototype.expression: {APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.alarm.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=1 and ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.battery.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}<={APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.battery.threshold.low.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()})
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.alarm.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=0 or ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.battery.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>=({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.battery.threshold.low.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}+{$HYSTERESIS}))

dependency.expression: {APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.alarm.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=1 and ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>={APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.threshold.max.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()})

trigger_prototype.expression: {APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.alarm.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=1 and ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>={APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.threshold.max.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()})
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.alarm.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=0 or ({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>=({APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.threshold.max.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}+{$HYSTERESIS}))
trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} {ITEM.LASTVALUE} :: Temperature > Max Threshold
